channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- list-n-stream node module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- list-n-stream node module

item.title: CVE-2017-16084|2024-09-16T17:33:15.728Z -- hackerone -- list-n-stream%20node%20module
item.description: list-n-stream is a server for static files to list and stream local videos. list-n-stream v0.0.10 or lower is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.
